resources.string: The Meteora is a rock formation in central Greece hosting one of the largest and most precipitously built complexes of Eastern Orthodox monasteries, second in importance only to Mount Athos.
Pertouli is a village in the Trikala Prefecture, Greece. It lies at the south part of the Pindos mountain chain, 32 km (20 mi) from Trikala city.
Lake Plastiras (also called Tavropos Reservoir) is an artificial lake fed by Tavropos (Megdovas) river, near the city of Trikala, Greece.
Trikala is a city in northwestern Thessaly, Greece, and the capital of the Trikala regional unit. The city straddles the Lithaios river, which is a tributary of Pineios river.
Barrouge is a Luxury Cafe at the center of Trikala. You have to visit it.
Eightball Playroom Cafe is a place full of games. There you can drink your coffee and play card games or backgammon.
Drink your coffee at the nature next to a beautiful waterfall.
Eleven is the biggest club in Trikala.
Skala Music Stage is the biggest Greek Music Stage in the Town.
At Mandragora Live Stage you can see Rap, Rock, Metal, Jazz etc bands playing live music.
Kripti is the spot. If you don\'t know where to go, just wear your jean and come for a shot!
Tsitsanis is one of the most famous Songwriters of Trikala Town. At the Museum you will see his Instruments.
This museum is full of medals of our ethletes.
This museum is full of historical photographies that anybody must see.
The old mill is the biggest mill in Trikala. It is inside the down and it is full of adventures.
A classic Cafe of Trikala with more than 20 years open at the center of Trikala.
